CustomField.description: Used to specify a user assignee using standard salesforce lookup behavior instead of having to type the user's name. Using standard lookup prevents typing errors and ensures that the user is correctly assigned regardless of locale settings.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to specify a user assignee using standard salesforce lookup behavior instead of having to type the user's name. Using standard lookup prevents typing errors and ensures that the user is correctly assigned regardless of locale settings.
CustomField.label: Assignee User
